archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Landing Pages Platform
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Goal: Create Landing Pages for POC and Live campaigns - to allow maximum flexibility for Designers and CCs, and minimize their manual input.
Key Features: - Create campaigns’ and assets’ tracking links - Record and store Engagements - Promotion LP Fast Creation for Campaign Coordinators - Fully featured Editor for Designers - Microsoft & PeerSpot Bulks - LP Versions control system - Responses Upload
